Title: .NET GPS Vehicle Controller
Description:
This project allows the connection to a GPS unit transmitting NMEA data on the serial port and displaying the current position on Google Earth.

There are also logging capabilities and control gauges for visual feedback on GPS data.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project allows the connection to a GPS unit transmitting NMEA data on the serial port and displaying the current position on Google Earth.

There are also logging capabilities and control gauges for visual feedback on GPS data.

Screenshots

Gauges View (.jpg) Google Earth View (.jpg)

External Controls and Images used

  • Gauges from: PolyMon Controls
  • Icons from: FamFamFam Silk Icons:http://www.famfamfam.com/lab/icons/silk/

Known Issue(s)

  • The current version does not have proper logging for NMEA data. The non-Google Earth version has text logging for GPS NMEA data.
